promotionsSatisfactionOkDumb_Desc.english: Unfortunately, %firstName% is not the brightest and has trouble developing new skills. However, %heShe% has accepted %hisHer% fate and is ok with it.
promotionsSatisfactionOkDumb_Desc.dutch: Helaas, %firstName% is niet the slimste en heeft moeilijkheden ontwikkelen nieuw vaardidheden, %hijZei% heeft aanvaard %zijnHaar% lot en is goed met het.
promotionsSatisfactionOkDumb_Desc.german: Leider ist %firstName% nicht der hellste und hat Schwierigkeiten, neue Fähigkeiten zu lernen. %cap-erSie% hat aber %seinIhr% Schicksal akzeptiert und findet es ok.
promotionsSatisfactionOkDumb_Desc.french: Malheureusement, %firstName% n'est pas %leLa% plus brillant%e% et a des difficultés à développer ses compétences. Cependant, %ilElle% a accepté son sort et %ilElle% est d'accord avec cela
promotionsSatisfactionOkDumb_Desc.spanish: Lamentablemente, %firstName% no es %elLa% más brillante y tiene problemas desarrollando nuevas habilidades. Sin embargo, ha aceptado su destino y está content%oA% con ello.
promotionsSatisfactionOkDumb_Desc.bulgarian: За съжаление, %firstName% не е най-яркият и има проблеми при разработването на нови умения. Въпреки това, той прие съдбата си и е съгласен с това.
promotionsSatisfactionOkDumb_Desc.turkish: Maalesef, %firstName% fazla parlak değil ve yeni beceriler geliştirmek konusunda sorun yaşıyor. Ancak kaderini kabul etti ve bu konuda sorun yok.
promotionsSatisfactionOkDumb_Desc.portuguese: Infelizmente, o %firstName% não é %oA% mais brilhante e tem dificuldade em desenvolver novas habilidades. No entanto, %eleEla% aceitou seu destino e está bem com isso.
promotionsSatisfactionOkDumb_Desc.russian: %firstName%, к сожалению, не сам%hesheEnd% умн%hesheEnd% и имеет проблемы с развитием навыков. Однако, %hisHer% смирил%wordEnd% с этим и радуется.
promotionsSatisfactionOkDumb_Desc.ukrainian: %firstName% нажаль, не сам%heshe_IY_A% розумн%heshe_IY_A% і має проблеми з розвитком навичок. Однак, %hisHer% це не турбує та  %heShe% прийня%hesheEnd% цю долю та радується.
promotionsSatisfactionOkDumb_Desc.chinese: 不幸的是,%firstName%并不是最聪明的,而且在发展新技能方面也有点困难.然而%heShe%已经接受了%hisHer%的命运,并接受了该技能.

salarySatisfactionAwesome_Desc.english: %firstName% didn't think %hisHer% work would be worth that much money. %cap-heShe% expects only %coins% coins per day, but the extra money brightens up %hisHer% day!
salarySatisfactionAwesome_Desc.dutch: %firstName% Niet gedacht %zijnHaar% werk zou zoveel waardt zou zijn. %cap-hijZei% verwacht aleen %coins% munten per dag,maar de extra munten licht op %zijnHaar% dag!
salarySatisfactionAwesome_Desc.german: %firstName% hätte nicht gedacht, dass %seineIhre% Arbeit so viel Gehalt wert sei. %cap-erSie% erwartet nur %coins% Münzen pro Tag, aber das Bonusgehalt stimmt %ihnSie% glücklich!
salarySatisfactionAwesome_Desc.french: %firstName% ne pensait pas que son travail valait autant d'argent. %cap-ilElle% s'attend à %coins% pièces par jour, mais l'argent supplémentaire illumine sa journée !
salarySatisfactionAwesome_Desc.portuguese: %firstName% Não achava que seu trabalho valeria tanto dinheiro. %cap-eleEla% espera %coins% moedas por dia, mas o dinheiro extra ilumina seu dia!
salarySatisfactionAwesome_Desc.turkish: %firstName%, yaptığı işin bu kadar maaş getireceğini düşünmemişti. Günde %coins% almayı beklerken, ilave para, gününü aydınlattı!
salarySatisfactionAwesome_Desc.spanish: %firstName% no pensaba que por su trabajo mereciera tanto dinero. %cap-élElla% espera %coins% por día, ¡pero el dinero extra ilumina su día!
salarySatisfactionAwesome_Desc.russian: %firstName% не ожидал%surnameA%, что %hisHer% работа будет приносить столько денег. %cap-heShe% расчитывал%surnameA% только на %coins% монет в день, но эта надбавка делает %hisHer% счастлив%hesheEnd3%!
salarySatisfactionAwesome_Desc.ukrainian: %firstName% очікував тільки на %coins% монет в день, але ця надбавка робить %hisHer% день чудовим!
salarySatisfactionAwesome_Desc.chinese: %firstName%不认为%hisHer%的工作值那么多工资.%heShe%希望每天工资只发放%coins%硬币,但如果加工资将会让%heShe%一整天感到很满意!

salarySatisfactionGood_Desc.english: %firstName% thinks %hisHer% last payday was adequate. %coins% coins per day is a normal salary for %himHer%.
salarySatisfactionGood_Desc.dutch: %firstName% Denkt %zijnHaar% laatst betaaldag was voldoende. %coins% Munten per dag is een normaal loan for %zijnHaar%.
salarySatisfactionGood_Desc.german: %firstName% hält %seinIhr% letztes Gehalt für angemessen. %coins% Münzen pro Tag ist ein normales Gehalt für %ihnSie%.
salarySatisfactionGood_Desc.french: %firstName% pense que son dernier jour de paie était satisfaisant. %coins% pièces par jour est un salaire normal pour %luiElle%.
salarySatisfactionGood_Desc.portuguese: %firstName% acha que seu último pagamento foi adequado. %coins% moedas por dia é um salário normal para %eleEla%.
salarySatisfactionGood_Desc.turkish: %firstName%, aldığı maaşın yaptığı işe göre yeterli olduğunu dşünüyor. Günde %coins% kazanmak onun için normal
salarySatisfactionGood_Desc.spanish: %firstName% piensa que su último día de sueldo estuvo adecuado. %coins% moneda por día es un sueldo normal según %élElla%.
salarySatisfactionGood_Desc.russian: %firstName% считает, что %coins% монет в день - хорошая зарплата для %himHer%.
salarySatisfactionGood_Desc.ukrainian: %firstName% рахує, що %coins% монет в день - це добра заробітня плата для %himHer% потреб
salarySatisfactionGood_Desc.chinese: %firstName%认为%hisHer%刚发的日薪是足够的.对他来说,每天的工资是正常的.

salarySatisfactionInsufficient_Desc.english: According to %firstName%, %heShe% deserves a minimum salary of %coins% coins per day.
salarySatisfactionInsufficient_Desc.dutch: Volgens naar %firstName%,  %hijZei% verdient een minimum loan of %coins% munten perdag.
salarySatisfactionInsufficient_Desc.german: %firstName% meint, %erSie% hätte %coins% Münzen am Tag verdient.
salarySatisfactionInsufficient_Desc.french: Selon %firstName%, %ilElle% mérite un salaire minimum de %coins% pièces par jour.
salarySatisfactionInsufficient_Desc.spanish: Según %firstName%, %élElla% se merece un sueldo mínimo de %coins% monedas por día.
salarySatisfactionInsufficient_Desc.portuguese: De acordo com %firstName% %eleEla% merece um salário mínimo de %coins% moedas por dia.
salarySatisfactionInsufficient_Desc.turkish: %firstName%, günde en az %coins% kazanması gerektiğini düşünüyor
salarySatisfactionInsufficient_Desc.russian: %firstName% считает, что заслуживает зарплату хотя бы %coins% в день.
salarySatisfactionInsufficient_Desc.ukrainian: %firstName% рахує, що заслуговує на заробітню плату хочаб %coins% в день
salarySatisfactionInsufficient_Desc.chinese: 根据%firstName%的情况,%heShe%认为最低工资应该有%coins%硬币才行.

salarySatisfactionBad_Desc.english: %firstName% is unhappy with %hisHer% last payday - in %hisHer% opinion, %heShe% deserves a minimum salary of %coins% coins per day.
salarySatisfactionBad_Desc.dutch: %firstName% is ongelukkig met %zijnHaar% laatst betaaldag - in %zijnHaar% mening %hijZei% verdient a minimum loan of %coins% munten per dag.
salarySatisfactionBad_Desc.german: %firstName% ist unzufrieden mit %seinemIhrem% letzten Gehalt. Wenn es nach %ihmIhr% ginge, würde %erSie% mindestens %coins% Münzen pro Tag verdienen.
salarySatisfactionBad_Desc.french: %firstName% est mécontent%e% de son dernier jour de paie - d'après %luiElle%, %ilElle% mérite un salaire minimum de %coins% pièces par jour.
salarySatisfactionBad_Desc.spanish: %firstName% no está content%oA% con su último pago - en su opinión, se merece un sueldo mínimo de %coins% monedas por día.
salarySatisfactionBad_Desc.portuguese: %firstName% está descontente com o seu último dia de pagamento - na sua opinião, %eleEla% merece um salário mínimo de %coins% moedas por dia.
salarySatisfactionBad_Desc.turkish: %firstName%, son maaşından memnun değil - onun düşüncesine göre günde en az %coins% kazanması gerekiyor.
salarySatisfactionBad_Desc.russian: %firstName% недоволен своей последней зарплатой - по %hisHer% мнению, %heShe% заслуживает зарплату минимум %coins% монет в день.
salarySatisfactionBad_Desc.ukrainian: %firstName% не задоволон%heshe_IY_A% заробітньою платою, по його %hisHer% думці, %heShe% заслуговує зарплату мінімум %coins% монет в день.
